David Foster Wallace Net Worth

David Foster Wallace had a net worth of $5 million. He was an American novelist, short story writer, essayist, and professor of English and creative writing, best known for his novel Infinite Jest. Wallace was born on February 21, 1962, in Ithaca, New York, and passed away on September 12, 2008, in Claremont, California. Aside from his literary work, he was also recognized for his long hair and received grants and awards such as the MacArthur Fellowship and the Lannan Literary Award for Fiction. Some interesting facts about him include the unfinished novel 'The Pale King' at the time of his death, his battle with severe depression, and his tenure as a creative writing and English professor at Pomona College until his passing. Jian Ghomeshi Net Worth According to resources, Jian Ghomeshi has an estimated net worth of approximately $6 Million. Jian Ghomeshi Wiki Biography Jian Ghomeshi is recognized as a Canadian writer, musician, and former CBC radio broadcaster. He was a member of the Thornhill-based folk-pop band Moxy Früvous from 1990 to 2000, contributing as a vocalist and drummer. Subsequently, he ventured into television and radio broadcasting. He is widely known for hosting various programs.
